scripts.docker:start: npm run env:dev && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.docker:start:prod: npm run env:prod && docker-compose --env-file .env.production -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.docker:stop: npm run env:dev && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.docker:build: npm run env:dev && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml build
scripts.docker:build:nocache: npm run env:dev && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml build --no-cache
scripts.docker:build:prod: npm run env:prod && docker-compose --env-file .env.production -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yml build
scripts.docker:build:prod:nocache: npm run env:prod && docker-compose --env-file .env.production -f docker/docker-compose.prod.yml build --no-cache
scripts.docker:down: npm run env:dev && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down -v --remove-orphans
scripts.docker:reset: npm run env:dev && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down -v --rmi all --remove-orphans
scripts.docker:restart: npm run docker:stop && npm run docker:start
scripts.build: npm run env:dev && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
